# `DevelopmentActivityAggregateQueryRequestFilter` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| type | `string` | Yes | The logic used to combine the clauses |
| clauses | [`DevelopmentActivityAggregateQueryRequestClause[]`](developmentactivityaggregatequeryrequestclause-definition.md) | Yes | The list of clauses used to filter the data. Note that clauses must filter by attendeeId and a maximum of 100 user IDs are allowed |
